text:
I have a problem with a Text element. When I save a DOM in a svg file, if I've
in some Text elements a javascript text, the characters " becames " in the
file.
Then, if I load that file, in the Text element I find the text trouncate at
level of & character. It's a critical character. I get text from Text with the
getData() method. 
Sorry form my english and thanks for all.
creator: marco.dongu@softeco.it
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
What do you use for saving your SVG files? What is happening here is that the
code e which serializes your file escapes the special characters and '&' is one
of them. Please provide more details so that we can see if this is a bug or a
mis-use of the APIs.

creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
Hello Marco,

See the DOMUtilitiesCharacterEscaping test. I suspect what you are running into
is that your <script> element does not use a CDATA section. To avoid character
escaping, you need to have a CDATA section:

<script><![CDATA[
& ! #
]]></script>
